```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(here)
```

### Estimated Use of Water in the US, County-Level Data for 2015 from the USGS. 
```{r}
water_use <- read.csv(here("data/usco2015v2.0.csv"), skip =1 ) %>% clean_names() 
```

### Convert character columns to numeric 
```{r}
water_use <- water_use %>%
  mutate(across(6:141, as.numeric))
```
